COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14e
STRING: [Torta] “Okay then, I'm going to head off.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x164
STRING: [Chris] “Alright. See you later.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x188
STRING: Torta stood up and headed outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x194
STRING: She didn't say a thing about what happened yesterday.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a0
STRING: Perhaps she planned only to talk about it if I brought it
up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b6
STRING: Just like Arie, Torta was also considerate in that kind of
way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c2
STRING: [Chris] “Phew...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d8
STRING: I looked at the clock, and decided to kill time here until
Lise's classes were over.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ee
STRING: I would have had enough time to go to the practice
rooms, but I just didn't feel like it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x204
STRING: I had played my Fortelle a bit in Ms. Cordell's class in
the morning, so I didn't need to practice much more
anyway.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21a
STRING: I had learned the song perfectly, so all that was left was
to actually go and perform it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x268
STRING: The last bell rang out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x274
STRING: My fingers moved on their own, into the shape they
would be when on the keys of the Fortelle, and
unconsciously played a certain song.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28a
STRING: I imagined the sound of her voice in my head.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x296
STRING: It would have been a bit odd if Lise had seen me like
this, so I consciously placed my hands on the table, and
waited for her to arrive.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ac
STRING: And then, Lise finally appeared.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b8
STRING: Even the cafeteria was quiet at this time of day.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c4
STRING: Lise peered about nervously, and then scampered over
upon finding me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fe
STRING: [Lise] “Uh, sorry to keep you waiting.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x314
STRING: [Chris] “It's okay, I haven't been here long.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x346
STRING: [Lise] “I see... So, what are we going to do today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35c
STRING: [Chris] “There's somewhere I want to drop by quickly.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37a
STRING: [Lise] “Somewhere you want to... Drop by?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x390
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, I want more people to hear you sing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3c2
STRING: [Lise] “Huh...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d8
STRING: [Chris] “C'mon, let's go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x41c
STRING: [Lise] “Um... What did you mean just now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x432
STRING: [Chris] “Exactly what I said.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x448
STRING: Lise looked anxious as she followed me further and
further down the hallway.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x47a
STRING: [Lise] “Um... I can't do this.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x490
STRING: [Chris] “Why not? I really think your voice deserves
more acknowledgment.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4cc
STRING: [Lise] “I-I really can't.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e2
STRING: [Chris] “Listen, Lise. You should be more confident in
yourself. It'll be okay, I guarantee it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x51e
STRING: [Lise] “Oh... But...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x534
STRING: [Chris] “If you think it's embarrassing, then that's all the
more reason to get used to it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x566
STRING: [Lise] “That's not...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x57c
STRING: I kept going ahead, ignoring most of what Lise was
saying.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x588
STRING: It wasn't a place that I had many fond memories of, but
it was definitely the best place to use if you needed
some random people to listen to you play.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5a8
STRING: Many students would constantly make music there, and
others would join in, if they liked what they heard.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5be
STRING: It would probably take Lise a while to get used to the
atmosphere in there.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ca
STRING: But, I was sure that she would be fine after we had
done an ensemble.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5e0
STRING: And if she could display her true singing ability to
everyone, I was sure that she'd receive a wave of praise
and applause.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5f6
STRING: At least, that's what was supposed to happen...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x626
STRING: [Chris] “Just give me a moment while I get my Fortelle
ready.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x646
STRING: Everyone's gaze shifted to us the moment I opened the
door.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x652
STRING: I suppose they thought some unusual faces had shown
up, and nothing more.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x668
STRING: If we started performing, no one would think any more
of it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x674
STRING: Although, it would be a different kind of problem if
people thought nothing more after hearing our
performance.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6b4
STRING: Lise was frozen in place behind me, as always.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6c0
STRING: [Chris] “Trust me, it'll be okay. I'll be ready in a sec.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6d6
STRING: When I spoke to her as I was setting up my Fortelle, I
noticed that something was even more out of the
ordinary.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x700
STRING: For some reason, Lise's eyes were tearing up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x70c
STRING: I soon realized why that was.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x718
STRING: [Chris] “Huh...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x744
STRING: The large number of students in the room were all
looking right at us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x75a
STRING: We weren't doing anything that warranted so much
attention.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x766
STRING: My feelings of suspicion grew, so I stopped what I was
doing and gazed at what was beginning to unfold in
front of my eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x78c
STRING: One by one, the students started to leave the room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x798
STRING: And no one was even attempting to look us in the eye.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7a4
STRING: They whispered something to each other, and went out
through the door, almost as if it had been planned.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7ba
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x804
STRING: In less than two minutes, we were the only ones left in
the middle of the spacious cenacolo.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x81a
STRING: What on earth just happened...?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x826
STRING: Suddenly realizing what it could be, I turned to look at
Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x84e
STRING: [Lise] “Ha-ha...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x864
STRING: [Chris] “Lise...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x896
STRING: [Lise] “Aha-ha-ha. Chris, I'm sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ac
STRING: [Chris] “What is it...? What is going on?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x910
STRING: [Lise] “I'm so sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x934
STRING: Lise crouched down into a ball after she apologized.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x940
STRING: It wasn't that she was avoiding people... But that they
were avoiding her?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x956
STRING: [Chris] “Lise, I'm sorry...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x96c
STRING: I really didn't understand why this just happened.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x978
STRING: But it was my fault that Lise was crying now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x984
STRING: There was do doubt about that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x990
STRING: I should never have brought her here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x99c
STRING: I should have listened to her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9a8
STRING: [Chris] “Lise, I... I didn't know anything...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9be
STRING: And even now I still knew nothing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9ca
STRING: But, just now I had gotten a glimpse of the reason why
she became like she was.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9e0
STRING: It seemed she was being bullied...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9ec
STRING: I never imagined something like this would happen at
this school, as there were a lot students who seemed so
refined.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa02
STRING: But, perhaps I just never realized because I never got
particularly involved with the other students.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa18
STRING: But even so...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa24
STRING: [Chris] “Lise... Let's just get out of here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa3a
STRING: She was still crouched down into a ball.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa46
STRING: I couldn't force her to stand up, so I did the only thing
that I could do, and crouched down next to her, laying a
gentle hand on her shoulder.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa66
STRING: I was hesitant to do even something as little as that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa72
STRING: [Chris] “I'm so sorry...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa9e
STRING: Looking about the room in a state of confusion, I heard
the tiny sound of the door opening behind me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xab4
STRING: Thinking that someone had come back to the cenacolo,
I turned around to see someone very unexpected
standing in the doorway.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xae6
STRING: [Fal] “Chris... Lise...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xafc
STRING: [Chris] “Huh...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb12
STRING: Fal didn't say anything as she moved closer to Lise, and
then spoke to her gently.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb44
STRING: [Fal] “Are you okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb76
STRING: [Lise] “Ah... Ah... Falsita.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb8c
STRING: Lise finally raised her head, and upon seeing me she
turned away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbb8
STRING: [Fal] “Chris... Do you think you could give us some
space?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbd8
STRING: [Chris] “Sure...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbee
STRING: It seemed that they knew each other, and either way
there was nothing I could do right now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc04
STRING: Lise probably didn't want people to watch her cry,
either.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc10
STRING: And furthermore... I was undoubtedly the cause of all
this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc1c
STRING: Perhaps I shouldn't stay here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc28
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry. Please take care of her... And, uh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc3e
STRING: When I tried to finish my sentence and say that we
should talk later, Fal cut me off by nodding in a way
that showed she already knew what I was going to
say.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc5c
STRING: [Fal] “Would you mind waiting somewhere that's not
outside the door, like the cafeteria?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc7c
STRING: [Chris] “Ah... Sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc92
STRING: When I went to leave after bowing deeply, Fal silently
nodded to me one more time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcdc
STRING: Once again, I found myself in the cafeteria, waiting for
time to pass.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xce8
STRING: My feelings might have been the opposite to what they
were when I was last here, however.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcf4
STRING: I was concerned about the situation that Lise was in.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd00
STRING: And, I regretted my thoughtless actions that put her in
that situation in the first place.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd16
STRING: The time passed slowly, and the long hand of the clock
had barely moved since I got here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd2c
STRING: Despite this... I somehow passed the time, and waited
for Fal to arrive.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd5c
STRING: It must have been about ten minutes later.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd68
STRING: The person I had been waiting for had finally appeared
at the cafeteria.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xda6
STRING: [Fal] “Sorry to keep you waiting so long...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdbc
STRING: [Chris] “Ah... That's okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdd2
STRING: Fal sat herself down across from me. Her previously
stern manner seemed a little more relaxed now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xde8
STRING: [Chris] “So... How is Lise?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe06
STRING: [Fal] “For the time being I had her go home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe1c
STRING: [Chris] “I see...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe4e
STRING: [Fal] “But, why were you there, Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe64
STRING: [Chris] “I wanted to ask you the same thing... But, I
guess I'll go first.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe96
STRING: And thus...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xea4
STRING: I explained in detail how Lise and I had been rehearsing
together in the Old Wing recently, and how I had
wanted everyone to hear her sing in the cenacolo.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xec4
STRING: I was aware that there were a lot of details I probably
shouldn't have talked about.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xed0
STRING: But, Fal's gentle voice incited me to speak more, and
before I knew it I had told her everything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xee8
STRING: It wasn't a problem that I could handle alone, and I had
a strange feeling that Fal might have known something,
and that it would have been best for me to talk to her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf12
STRING: [Chris] “...And that's what happened.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf44
STRING: [Fal] “So that's what was going on...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf5a
STRING: [Chris] “So, why were you there, Fal?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf8c
STRING: [Fal] “It was just by coincidence, but I happened to be
walking through the hallway near the cenacolo when
suddenly a lot of people came out...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfac
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... But, you saved the day.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfca
STRING: [Fal] “I didn't do anything, really.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfe0
STRING: [Chris] “Are you and Lise friends?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1012
STRING: [Fal] “I wouldn't say we are friends, but... We've spoken
a couple of times, like this.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1032
STRING: [Chris] “Do you know any details about any of this?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1064
STRING: [Fal] “I'm sorry... I really don't know anything, either.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x107a
STRING: [Chris] “I see...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1098
STRING: [Fal] “However... I have heard some unpleasant rumors.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ae
STRING: [Chris] “What kind of rumors...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10cc
STRING: [Fal] “Ones... That I'd rather not repeat. Ones that
would hurt Lise's reputation.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ec
STRING: Fal looked uncomfortable as she tried to avoid saying
anything directly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10f8
STRING: Something that would hurt Lise's reputation...?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1104
STRING: I wondered why anyone would want to say things like
that about Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x111a
STRING: I for one, could not think of any reasons.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1142
STRING: [Fal] “I don't know who started these rumors, but it
seems they are becoming quite widespread.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1162
STRING: [Chris] “Really...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1194
STRING: [Fal] “Who would have thought that something like this
was happening here...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11aa
STRING: [Chris] “In any case, thank you very much for your help
today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11dc
STRING: [Fal] “Why is it that you are thanking me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11f2
STRING: [Chris] “Uh... It's just, everything today happened
because of me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1224
STRING: [Fal] “But, these rumors started before you had even
met her, you know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x123a
STRING: Fal said this to make me feel better, but it was hardly
any consolation for me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x126c
STRING: [Fal] “You're concerned about Lise, aren't you...? Are
you considering asking her to be your partner for the
recital?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x128c
STRING: [Chris] “A little, yes...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12aa
STRING: [Fal] “But, she...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12c0
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12f2
STRING: [Fal] “No... It's nothing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1308
STRING: [Chris] “Fal... You know something, don't you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x133a
STRING: [Fal] “At the very least, I suppose I know more than you

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1350
STRING: [Chris] “Could you tell me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1382
STRING: [Fal] “I probably shouldn't...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1398
STRING: [Chris] “Fal... Have you ever heard Lise sing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13d4
STRING: [Fal] “Huh? Ah... No, I haven't.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13ea
STRING: [Chris] “She looks happy when she sings. I mean, really
happy.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x142a
STRING: [Chris] “And she sings really well too, but...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1448
STRING: [Fal] “Chris...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x145e
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... I'm sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1490
STRING: [Fal] “It's okay, it shows just how concerned you are
about her. Although, I guess it is a little frustrating.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14b0
STRING: [Chris] “Frustrating...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14e2
STRING: [Fal] “Well, I thought for a while that I was a potential
choice as your recital partner.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x151a
STRING: But you've been
rehearsing with Lise this whole time, haven't you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1526
STRING: [Chris] “Ah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1558
STRING: [Fal] “I'm kidding... The part about it being a little
frustrating is kind of true, though. Anyway, do you plan
to speak with Lise again, Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1578
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, if it's possible, that is. But I don't even
know if I'll be able to see her again.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1598
STRING: I would probably wait in the Old Wing for Lise again
tomorrow, too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15a4
STRING: Although, it was hard to say whether or not she would
come.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15b0
STRING: Right now, I didn't really care about partnering up or
any of that stuff.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15bc
STRING: The one thing that was clear was that I hurt her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15d2
STRING: If I could apologize, or do something for her...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15de
STRING: In any case, I just wanted to see her and speak to her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15f2
STRING: [Fal] “In that case... Would you like to see her this
Saturday?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1608
STRING: [Chris] “This Saturday? And, how?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1626
STRING: [Fal] “She asked me to deliver a message. She said she
won't be able to make it tomorrow. You two agreed to
meet, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1646
STRING: [Chris] “Uh... Well, we hadn't exactly made a proper
plan. But, what's this about Saturday?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1682
STRING: [Fal] “If you want, I could try asking her to come to the
trattoria that I work at.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16a2
STRING: [Chris] “You could do that...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16d4
STRING: [Fal] “I imagine you don't even know what classes she's
in, but I think I could probably talk to her.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16f4
STRING: [Chris] “Could I ask you to do that for me...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1712
STRING: [Fal] “Of course. Once I've spoken to her, I'll come and
see you in the cafeteria. You're always there at midday,
right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1732
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah. I'm almost always there after my classes
finish.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1750
STRING: [Fal] “Okay, good. We can talk more about it then.
Anyway, I have some things to take care of, so I should
probably be going.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1770
STRING: [Chris] “Hey, Fal.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1786
STRING: Fal stood up, and was about to leave.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1792
STRING: I called out to her from behind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17ba
STRING: [Fal] “Hm? What's is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17d0
STRING: [Chris] “Thank you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1802
STRING: [Fal] “Hehe. Don't mention it, I'm doing this because I
want to.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1826
STRING: Saying only this, Fal left the cafeteria.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1832
STRING: I stayed in the cafeteria for a bit longer, and thought
about what I should do.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1848
STRING: I had the feeling I wasn't going to be in the mood to
practice much until the weekend.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x185e
STRING: But, I didn't feel that I'd be able to discuss this with
Phorni, either.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x186a
STRING: She'd probably get angry if I didn't try to find a partner
for the recital, so I needed to find a good way to kill
time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1880
STRING: But all of that is an issue for tomorrow.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x188c
STRING: For the time being, all I could do was think about what I
should do next.
